ComicInfo.Summary:
The finale is here! Liesel fears her attempt to cure Robyn with Igor's antidote may have failed. Meanwhile time is running out as Von plans to take his criminal empire beyond Brooklyn as his army of vampires continues to grow rapidly. Is all lost or can Liesel form a plan to save her friend and New York all in a matter of one night?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Allan Otero & Grostieta | 1 | B | Cover B | Igor Vitorino & Adriano Augusto | 2 | C | Cover C | Richard Williams | 3 | D | Cover D | Riveiro & Ceci de la Cruz | 4 | E | Subscription Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 75 | Riveiro | Missing | F | VIP Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Eric Basaldua | Missing | G | VIP Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Eric Basaldua | Missing | H | In-Store Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Keith Garvey | Missing | I | ZENBOX Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 150 | Mike DeBalfo & Sanju Nivangune | Missing | J | Cosplay Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Michael Dooney & Ula Mos | Missing |
